tree.speaker: [Lucosa]
tree.text: Ho, traveller! You've gotten pretty far up here!

tree.speaker: [Lucosa]
tree.text: Hm? You don't seem very thrilled for someone about to reach the top!

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: It's just nerves, nothing to worry about.

dialogue.speaker: [Lucosa]
dialogue.text: Ah, I see. Is it about that shapeshifter on the loose?

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: In a way... yeah, it is.

path.speaker: [Lucosa]
path.text: Is that all? Well, I don't think you need to worry much.

path.speaker: [Lucosa]
path.text: That's good to hear. It's kind of tiring how scared people can get.

path.speaker: [Lucosa]
path.text: Between you and me... I don't think that shapeshifter is a problem. They just wanna see the waterfall, like any of us.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: Hm. Yeah, I like that outlook. Thank you.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: ...Nothing. It's nothing. Don't worry about it.

path.speaker: [Lucosa]
path.text: Oh, okay. Well, enjoy your hike!
